EmailTemplate.subject: Heading to NBAA? Catch these New GoDirect Breakout Sessions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
NBAA is just around the corner which means it’s time for another exciting breakout session lineup from Honeywell GoDirect™. From new flight planning technology to the latest in connected maintenance to a new online marketplace that will change the aircraft industry, Honeywell covers this and more.
Don’t miss these FREE sessions that touch on new topics, trends and technology in the business aviation marketplace.
Check out our lineup below and view the full descriptions online <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_NBAA_BreakoutSession.html]]>.
Honeywell NBAA Breakout Sessions 2018 Location: Orlando Convention Center, Room S310E
Tuesday, October 16 9-10 a.m.
Breaking Down Flight Department Silos - How to Create a Unified Flight Planning Experience
Tuesday, October 16 10:30-11:30 a.m. Wednesday, October 17 10-11 a.m.
GoDirect™ Cabin - Controlling Cost while Optimizing User Experience
Tuesday, October 1612:00-1:30 p.m.
GoDirect™ Trade - Revolutionizing an Antiquated Industry
Tuesday, October 16 2-3 p.m.Wednesday, October 17 11:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m. GoDirect™ Flight - Preview the Next Evolution in Flight Planning Technology and Experience
Wednesday, October 171-2 p.m.
GoDirect™ Maintenance - Learn How You Can Save up to 10% of Your MSP Bill Based on Preferred Engine Operation Enabled through Data Analytics
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_NBAA_BreakoutSession.html]]>
